QuestData.Title: Sharing Intelligence
QuestData.Description: Thank you, $c! The information you've extracted is of vital importance to the Kirin Tor.$b$bReturn at once to Donathan as we make plans for the rescue of Lady Evanor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Normantis has asked you to report to Librarian Donathan on Amber Ledge.
QuestData.RewardText: Forgive me, $n. I know that was unpleasant work.$b$bWere it not for the desperation of our circumstance I'd never have asked you to assist us in such a manner.$b$bSo... what have you discovered?
